name: ImageFap Downloader
tagline: Save ImageFap galleries in organized offline folders.
description:
ImageFap Downloader helps archivists and teams capture ImageFap galleries they have permission to view. It pulls full-resolution images, keeps albums intact, and avoids the broken downloads that come with manual saving.

Use it to catalog research collections, prep backups for client deliverables, or carry personal sets with you when you're offlineâ€”all while respecting creator rights and privacy.
seo_description: Download full ImageFap galleries with original quality and structure. Reliable ImageFap downloader for organized archives.
features: Download galleries you are authorized to access without compression
Preserve album hierarchy, titles, and file order automatically
Bulk queue multiple galleries with built-in duplicate detection
Local-first design so sensitive archives stay on your drives
Works across Windows, macOS, Linux, and leading browsers

pricing.label: One-time
pricing.note: Contact us for current licensing options.

faqs.question: Can ImageFap Downloader handle large galleries?
faqs.answer: Yes. Queue galleries of any size and the downloader processes them sequentially while keeping folders intact.

faqs.question: Does it support videos?
faqs.answer: The focus is on image galleries. Videos download when provided as part of the gallery assets.

faqs.question: Are filenames preserved?
faqs.answer: Original filenames and ordering stay intact so you can reference content later without confusion.

faqs.question: Do you store my downloads?
faqs.answer: No. Downloads are saved directly to your device and nothing is uploaded back to us.

faqs.question: Does this bypass paywalled content?
faqs.answer: No. You must already have access to the gallery through ImageFap. It respects platform authentication.

reviews.name: Veda Lang
reviews.review: ImageFap Downloader lets me archive full sets quickly and the folder structure stays clean.
reviews.title: Perfect for gallery backups

reviews.name: Jonah Ruiz
reviews.review: I batch multiple galleries each week. The downloader never skips files and metadata stays intact.
reviews.title: Reliable bulk downloads

reviews.name: Nia Calder
reviews.review: I need local copies without cloud sync. This tool keeps everything on my own drives with zero tracking.
reviews.title: Keeps sensitive work offline
